amendment.description: Amendment increases funding levels in the bill for administration expenses from $10 million to $14 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 106-558 to make technical changes that specifically enumerate the amounts of money made available to administer the Pittman-Robertson and Dingell-Johnson Acts in FY's 2001-2003 and gives the method for determining the amount of funding made available for FY 2004 and beyond.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
